contexts.summary: Initial clone, build verification, comprehensive code review, comparative framework analysis (Playwright/FlaUI/PAD/Rust), performance optimization roadmap, updated REVIEW.md, TODO.md, USER_MANUAL.md

Implementation session: MCP configs, Python perf fixes (pg.PAUSE, ImageDraw, print, ThreadPool bound), PowerShell->stdlib (winreg/locale/platform), Bearer auth with DPAPI, PyO3 Rust scaffold (system_info), Build.ps1 with CargoTools. 140->184 tests.
Rust capture_tree module, COMGuard fixes, SSRF+shell security, review findings (C3/H5) fixed, import cleanup (isort/F401), 157 new tests (235->392), zero-warning build enforcement.

Rust-Native UIA Replacement Plan complete: query.rs + pattern.rs (820 lines), 9 PyO3 wrappers, Find+Invoke tool fast-paths, 25 Rust tests, 13 live-desktop tests, test isolation fixes. Background agents: 353+ new tests (audit, rate limiting, permissions, ProcessService, tree traversal, get_state, ValuePattern). 2115 Python + 25 Rust + 13 live tests.
